name: Hungry Terror (Early Demo)
description:
This is a demo/beta test of a game I am working on called "Hungry Terror". Find The part to the burger around the house To make a burger, So you can escape.

This Game will be bigger in the future, This is just a early demo.

Subscribe to my youtube channel "MarquesBGaming" for future updates: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCyZNBhPu6XpCTmU0yhLiZRg/featured
